column4: hello all. Can somebody please help with Pan newsreader basics. Would like to log on to a list, can't seem to.
Help with Pan newsreader basics please?
Hello. Help with Pan newsreader please?...
i use pan, and it works fine. but a lot can vary depending on server.
you need to get group list from server (whichs is probably huge these days)
do you see the list of newsgroups?
you need to download that from server if you haven't.
i think there's a "server" menu. look for option to download newsgroups.
once you have master list (.newsrc) you should see them (LOTS OF THEM) under "other"
if you do Server->Get list of all groups, does it work?
servers->download all newsgroups ... does that work?
ah... version i'm using isn't on ubuntu (long story) so maybe they changed it?
